param.name: range
param.default: if this.assignedcontrolled.jobmainsector then this.assignedcontrolled.jobmainsector else this.sector

param.name: minbuy
param.comment: Min gate distance to buy. Buy range supported if $minbuy and $maxbuy are provided

param.name: maxbuy
param.comment: Max gate distance to buy. Buy range supported if $minbuy and $maxbuy are provided

param.name: minsell
param.comment: Min gate distance to sell. Sell range supported if $minsell and $maxsell are provided

param.name: maxsell
param.comment: Max gate distance to sell. Sell range supported if $minsell and $maxsell are provided

param.name: distancecheck
param.comment: Should we compare distances between trade deals?

param.name: ignoretraderules
param.comment: If we trade with a player station, should we ignore trade rules?

param.name: autowares
param.default: if this.assignedcontrolled.isplayerowned then true else false

param.name: illegalwares
param.comment: Enable wares considered illegal in range.

param.name: ignoreshipbuyers
param.comment: Trading with ships is still terrible.

param.name: enablelogbook
param.default: if this.assignedcontrolled.isplayerowned then true else false

param.name: warebasket
param.comment: Manually added wares or job input

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- Starting Log File -- %1'.[player.age]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %1 -- Capacity/MinFill -- Universal: %2 -- Container: %3 / %4 -- Solid: %5 / %6 -- Liquid: %7 / %8'.[player.age,$universalcapacity,$containercapacity,$minfillcontainer,$solidcapacity,$minfillsolid,$liquidcapacity,$minfillliquid]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %1 -- minbuy %2 -- maxbuy %3 -- minsell %4 -- maxsell %5'.[player.age,$minbuy,$maxbuy,$minsell,$maxsell]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- Distance %s -- DeadTaterDelay %s'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,this.assignedcontrolled.gatedistance.{$sector}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled},$DeadTaterDelay]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- Removed reason -- relation: %s -- travel blacklist: %s -- activity blacklist: %s'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,(this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner.relationto.{$sector.trueowner} le -0.32),($sector.isblacklisted.{blacklisttype.sectortravel}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}),($sector.isblacklisted.{blacklisttype.sectoractivity}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled})]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- JumpPath.count %s -- REMOVED BECAUSE INVALID JUMP PATH'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,@$range.gatedistance.{$sector}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- JumpPath.count %s -- REMOVED BECAUSE INVALID JUMP PATH'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,@$jumppath.count]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- (%s)JumpPath.name %s'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,$c,@$jumppath.{$c}.knownname]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- (%s)JumpPath.name %s -- Removed reason -- relation: %s -- travel blacklist: %s'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,$c,@$jumppath.{$c}.knownname,(this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner.relationto.{$jumppath.{$c}.trueowner} le -0.32),($jumppath.{$c}.isblacklisted.{blacklisttype.sectortravel}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled})]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Buyspace.{%s}.name %s -- ADDED TO FINAL BUYSPACES LIST'.[player.age,$a,@$buyspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Sellspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- Distance %s -- DeadTaterDelay %s'.[player.age,$a,@$sellspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,this.assignedcontrolled.gatedistance.{$sector}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled},$DeadTaterDelay]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Sellspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- Removed reason -- relation: %s -- travel blacklist: %s -- activity blacklist: %s'.[player.age,$a,@$sellspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,(this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner.relationto.{$sector.trueowner} le -0.32),($sector.isblacklisted.{blacklisttype.sectortravel}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}),($sector.isblacklisted.{blacklisttype.sectoractivity}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled})]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Sellspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- JumpPath.count %s -- REMOVED BECAUSE INVALID JUMP PATH'.[player.age,$a,@$sellspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,@$range.gatedistance.{$sector}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Sellspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- JumpPath.count %s -- REMOVED BECAUSE INVALID JUMP PATH'.[player.age,$a,@$sellspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,@$jumppath.count]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Sellspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- (%s)JumpPath.name %s'.[player.age,$a,@$sellspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,$c,@$jumppath.{$c}.knownname]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %s -- Sellspace.{%s}.name %s -- (%s)Sector.name %s -- (%s)JumpPath.name %s -- Removed reason -- relation: %s -- travel blacklist: %s'.[player.age,$a,@$sellspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname,$b,@$sector.knownname,$c,@$jumppath.{$c}.knownname,(this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner.relationto.{$jumppath.{$c}.trueowner} le -0.32),($jumppath.{$c}.isblacklisted.{blacklisttype.sectortravel}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled})]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: TestBlacklistFiltering -- %1 -- Sellspace.{%2}.name %3 -- ADDED TO FINAL SELLSPACES LIST'.[player.age,$a,@$sellspaceswithbanned.{$a}.knownname]

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %1 -- Sectors in Range -- Buy: %2 -- Sell: %3 -- Est DeadTaterDelay Sum %4'.[player.age,$buyspaces.count,$sellspaces.count,$DeadTaterDelay * ($buyspaces.count + $sellspaces.count)]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Ship: %s(%s) -- Time spent checking sectors: %s -- Time spent checking buy spaces: %s -- Time spent checking sell spaces: %s'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.name,this.assignedcontrolled.idcode,(player.age - $CheckSectorsStartTime),($CheckSellSpacesStartTime - $CheckBuySpacesStartTime),(player.age - $CheckSellSpacesStartTime)]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %1 -- Scanning CargoBay: %2'.[player.age,$Cargo.count]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %1 -- CargoBay Contains: %2 -- Amount: %3'.[player.age,$Cargo.{$ware},this.assignedcontrolled.cargo.{$Cargo.{$ware}}.count]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %1 -- Buy Offer for: %2 at %3 -- Amount: %4 -- Desired Amount: %5 -- Offer Amount: %6 -- Stock: %7 -- Profit: %8 -- Payout:%9 -- Distance: %10 -- Distance Scale: %11 -- Scaled: %12 -- Highest Grofit: %13 -- Available: %14 -- Restricted: %15 -- MinAmount: %16 -- Free Space: %17'.[player.age,$buyoffer.ware,$buyoffer.buyer.knownname,$Amount,$buyoffer.desiredamount,$buyoffer.offeramount,$buyoffer.stocklevel,$Amount*$buycost,$buycost,$distance,$distancescale,$totalearned,$Grofit,$buyoffer.available,$buyoffer.restriction.factions.count,$buyoffer.minamount,$buyoffer.buyer.cargo.{$buyoffer.ware}.free]

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Ship: %s(%s) -- Time spent checking SellCargo: %s'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.name,this.assignedcontrolled.idcode,(player.age - $SellCargoStartTime)]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Selling '+$Gromount+' '+$GrofferBuy.ware+' for '+$GrofferBuy.unitprice/100+' at '+$GrofferBuy.buyer.knownname+' DealAvailiability: '+$GrofferBuy.available

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Creating Trade Offer after '+(player.age-$starttime)s+'s.'

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: '\nMOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- No Wares Detected! Resetting to start!'

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Searching for my faction trade deals'

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Ship: %s(%s) -- Queued up for trade -- Spot in queue %s / %s'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.name,this.assignedcontrolled.idcode,global.$DATaterQueue.{this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner}.indexof.{this.assignedcontrolled},global.$DATaterQueue.{this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner}.count]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Checking offers for ware: '+$usedwarebasket.{$ware}

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- I found these offers nearby, Buy: '+$buyoffers.count+' Sell: '+$selloffers.count

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Scanning buy offer for ('+$buyoffer.ware+') at ('+$buyoffer.buyer.knownname+') Price: '+$buycost+' Faction: '+$buyoffer.buyer.owner+' Restriction: '+$buyoffer.restriction.factions.count+' Raw OfferPrice: '+$buyoffer.unitprice/100+' Relation: '+$buyoffer.buyer.relationto.{this.assignedcontrolled.owner}+' Gate Distance: '+this.assignedcontrolled.gatedistance.{$buyoffer.buyer}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}+' Distance Raw: '+this.assignedcontrolled.distanceto.{$buyoffer.buyer}

do_if.value: (not $ignoretraderules) and (($selloffer.seller.trueowner == this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner) or ($buyoffer.buyer.trueowner == this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner)) and ($playerowned) and (not ($selloffer.seller.trueowner == $buyoffer.buyer.trueowner))

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Scanning sell offer for ('+$buyoffer.ware+') at ('+$selloffer.seller.knownname+') Faction: ('+$selloffer.seller.owner+') Restriction: ('+$selloffer.restriction.factions+') Buying at '+$buycost+' Selling at '+$sellcost+' Average: '+$buyoffer.ware.averageprice/100+' Amount: '+$Amount+' Grofit: '+ $Amount*($buycost-$sellcost)+' Ratio: '+$Ratio+' Rating: '+$Rating+' RawSellOffer Price: '+$selloffer.unitprice/100+' Relation: '+$selloffer.seller.relationto.{this.assignedcontrolled.owner}+' Gate Distance: '+$selloffer.seller.gatedistance.{$buyoffer.buyer}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}+' Distance Raw: '+$selloffer.seller.distanceto.{$buyoffer.buyer}+' Distance Scale: '+$distancescale

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Ship: %s(%s) -- Time spent checking PreferOwnFaction: %s -- Time spent in queue: %s'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.name,this.assignedcontrolled.idcode,(player.age - $PreferOwnFactionStartTime - $TotalQueueTime),$TotalQueueTime]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Searching for trade deals'

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Ship: %s(%s) -- Queued up for trade -- Spot in queue %s / %s'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.name,this.assignedcontrolled.idcode,global.$DATaterQueue.{this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner}.indexof.{this.assignedcontrolled},global.$DATaterQueue.{this.assignedcontrolled.trueowner}.count]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Checking offers for ware: '+$usedwarebasket.{$ware}

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- I found these offers nearby, Buy: '+$buyoffers.count+' Sell: '+$selloffers.count

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Scanning buy offer for ('+$buyoffer.ware+') at ('+$buyoffer.buyer.knownname+') Price: '+$buycost+' Faction: '+$buyoffer.buyer.owner+' Restriction: '+$buyoffer.restriction.factions.count+' Raw OfferPrice: '+$buyoffer.unitprice/100+' Relation: '+$buyoffer.buyer.relationto.{this.assignedcontrolled.owner}+' Gate Distance: '+this.assignedcontrolled.gatedistance.{$buyoffer.buyer}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}+' Distance Raw: '+this.assignedcontrolled.distanceto.{$buyoffer.buyer}

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Scanning sell offer for ('+$buyoffer.ware+') at ('+$selloffer.seller.knownname+') Faction: ('+$selloffer.seller.owner+') Restriction: ('+$selloffer.restriction.factions+') Buying at '+$buycost+' Selling at '+$sellcost+' Average: '+$buyoffer.ware.averageprice/100+' Amount: '+$Amount+' Grofit: '+ $Amount*($buycost-$sellcost)+' Ratio: '+$Ratio+' Rating: '+$Rating+' RawSellOffer Price: '+$selloffer.unitprice/100+' Relation: '+$selloffer.seller.relationto.{this.assignedcontrolled.owner}+' Gate Distance: '+$selloffer.seller.gatedistance.{$buyoffer.buyer}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}+' Distance Raw: '+$selloffer.seller.distanceto.{$buyoffer.buyer}+' Distance Scale: '+$distancescale

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Ship: %s(%s) -- Time spent checking Free Trade: %s -- Time spent in queue: %s'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.name,this.assignedcontrolled.idcode,(player.age - $FreeTradeStartTime - $TotalQueueTime),$TotalQueueTime]

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Checking if we can afford this deal! Money: '+$spendablemoney+' TotalCost: '+($itemcostsell*$Gromount)+' PerCost: '+$itemcostsell

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Buying '+$Gromount+' '+$GrofferSell.ware+' for '+$itemcostsell+' at '+$GrofferSell.seller.knownname+' then '+'Selling '+$Gromount+' '+$GrofferBuy.ware+' for '+$itemcostbuy+' at '+$GrofferBuy.buyer.knownname

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- $Gromount: '+$Gromount+' -- $ClampedAmount: '+$ClampedAmount+' -- Reason: '+$ClampedReason+'.'

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- $Gromount: '+$Gromount+' -- $ClampedAmount: '+$ClampedAmount+' -- Reason: '+$ClampedReason+'.'

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Creating Trade Offer after '+(player.age-$starttime)s+'s.'

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Looks like the trade were looking at is no longer available.'

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- We cant afford this deal anymore'

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Order: '+this.assignedcontrolled.order.id+' Failed to find a trade ' + $SearchFailed + ' times. Waiting before checking again.'

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Order: '+this.assignedcontrolled.order.id+' Failed to find a trade ' + $SearchFailed + ' times. Waiting before checking again.'

debug_to_file.name: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- '+player.age+' -- Order: '+this.assignedcontrolled.order.id+' Failed to find a trade ' + $SearchFailed + ' times. Notifying player.'

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DeadTater -- %s -- Ship: %s(%s) -- Trade failure procedures failed: %s'.[player.age,this.assignedcontrolled.name,this.assignedcontrolled.idcode,if $SearchFailed? then $SearchFailed else 'Null',if $GrofitFound? then $GrofitFound else 'Null', if $StationTrade then $StationTrade else 'Null']
